pages.title: Nexus Convergence Core
pages.text: Deep within the Aetherial Confluence Chamber, the Nexus Convergence Core serves as the central hub where every Aetherflow Conduit converges. Crafted from void-forged alloys and enchanted crystal, its surface is etched with shifting runes that pulse with raw arcane power.

pages.title: Functions & Integration
pages.text: The Core harmonizes energy from the Heartstone and the Rift, synchronizing the Bastionâ€™s magical systems and powering advanced rituals. Its interactive holographic interface allows mages to monitor energy flows and adjust parameters in real time.
